canonical_structure.name: UBX-CFG-ESFALG
canonical_structure.description: Get/set IMU-mount misalignment configuration (rotation from installation-frame to the IMU-frame).

fields.name: bitfield
fields.description: Bitfield containing configuration flags such as auto-alignment enable.

adjudication.reasoning: The extraction provided for the UBX-CFG-ESFALG message aligns perfectly with the standard u-blox M8 protocol specification. The byte offsets (0, 4, 8, 10) correctly sum up to the fixed payload length of 12 bytes. Data types (X4, U4, I2, I2) and scaling factors (1e-2) are consistent with the documented units of 0.01 degrees.
